posts.content: Hi - not a biggy but when opening links that members put on the forums it would be better for a new tab/page to open the link as opposed to the SSVC user page being updated. I often forget that I have opened a page from a forum link and end up closing a session which often has taken a while to locate (searching pages/topics to get links). Just a thought anyways. R

Reuben wrote:Hi - not a biggy but when opening links that members put on the forums it would be better for a new tab/page to open the link as opposed to the SSVC user page being updated. I often forget that I have opened a page from a forum link and end up closing a session which often has taken a while to locate (searching pages/topics to get links). Just a thought anyways. R


good point
I always CTRL+click on links to get them on a new tab for the same reason.
